PLUMED
------

Description: 
   PLUMED is an open source plugin for free energy calculations in molecular systems. 

Website: 
   `http://www.plumed-code.org <http://www.plumed-code.org>`__ 

Reference: 
   You may wish to cite the following reference if you have utilized PLUMED in your work: 

   .. code-block:: none

      Bonomi, D. Branduardi, G. Bussi, C. Camilloni, D. Provasi, P. Raiteri, D. Donadio,
      F. Marinelli, F. Pietrucci, R.A. Broglia and M. Parrinello
      PLUMED: a portable plugin for free-energy calculations with molecular dynamics,
      Comp. Phys. Comm. 2009 vol. 180 (10) pp. 1961-1972.
